description.narrative: Development of Cornerstone Public Policies and Institutional Capacities to accelerate Sustainable Energy for All (SE4ALL)

title.narrative: Mid-term evaluation for Sustainable Energy for All Project
Engagement of Mid-Term Review National Consultant for SE4ALL Project
International Consultant to produce Lesotho?s Country Action Agenda and Investment Prospectus
RFP - FINANCIAL SUPPORT SCHEME MANAGEMENT AGENT
RFP - Undertake Pre-feasibility study for mini-grids in 20 village communities spanning 5 of Lesotho?s 10 districts

condition.narrative: Social and environmental sustainability will be enhanced through application of the UNDP Social and Environmental Standards (http://www.undp.org/ses) and related Accountability Mechanism (http://www.undp.org/secu-srm).

description.narrative: The IRRF is UNDP’s results framework to monitor and report on its achievements against the Strategic Plan 2018-2021. UNDP publishes country level IRRF results that UNDP’s projects contributed to
